name: Harlem Lofts
details: This Manhattan hotel is located across the street from Madison Square Garden and Penn Station.

name: Hotel Pennsylvania
details: This Manhattan hotel is located across the street from Madison Square Garden and Penn Station.

name: Harlem Lofts
details: Located in New York, Harlem Lofts has well-equipped accommodations featuring free WiFi, 2.7 km from Columbia University and 3.2 km from Yankee Stadium.

name: Flatiron Hotel
details: This boutique hotel is located in the Flatiron District of Manhattan and features a modern lobby with a cylindrical fish tank which can be viewed from 2 floors.

name: Radio City Apartments
details: Located 484 m from Rockefeller Center, this Manhattan hotel offers free WiFi and rooms equipped with a kitchenette and cable TV. The 49th Street underground station is 1 block away.

name: The Roosevelt Hotel
details: Known as the Grand Dame of Madison Avenue, The Roosevelt Hotel opened during the Jazz.
